729543f-a.title: Richmond: Romer Road - Four Corners Road
729543f-a.text:
Romer Road (vantagepoint), west side, between Four Corners and
St. George Roads, showing the''Romer House''. P. L. Sperr states that it
is the residence of Comptroller Berry. In 1874 it was on the property
of S. Wann, and later (1898-1907) on that of George Cromwell. The
driveway shown is the private road leading up to the house from Romer
Road.
July 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
